keyMoments.title: Big Mom Pirates Debut
keyMoments.description: The Big Mom Pirates are introduced as one of the most powerful pirate crews in the New World, led by Emperor Big Mom. Members Pekoms and Tamago are shown collecting tribute on Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a Yonko crew that will play a major role in future arcs.

keyMoments.title: Big Mom Pirates' Protection System Explained
keyMoments.description: The crew's territory protection system is revealed - they claim territories and demand monthly tributes in exchange for protection under Big Mom's flag.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes how Yonko crews operate in the New World and control territories.

keyMoments.title: Bobbin's Enforcement Report
keyMoments.description: Bobbin reports destroying a country that failed to pay tribute, demonstrating the crew's brutal enforcement methods.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the consequences of failing to meet Big Mom's demands and the crew's ruthlessness.

jollyRoger: A skull with a large grin wearing a pirate hat, surrounded by candy and flames

reveals.information: One of the Four Emperors' crews, among the most powerful in the world
Claims territories and demands tributes (like 10 tons of candy monthly from Fish-Man Island) for protection
Will destroy countries that fail to pay tribute
Has ranking system including combatants and bishops
